search.query: | rest services/apps/local | search disabled=0 | dedup title | fields title | rename title As App | map search="| rest servicesNS/nobody/$$App$$/storage/collections/config" maxsearches=200 | rename title As Collection | rename eai:acl.app As App | dedup App, Collection | foreach field.* [eval Fields=if(isnull(Fields), if(isnotnull('<<FIELD>>'), "<<MATCHSTR>>", null()), if(isnotnull('<<FIELD>>'), Fields.", "."<<MATCHSTR>>", Fields))] | table App Collection Fields | sort App, Collection
